notes.rarity_system: Weight determines quest appearance probability - higher weight = rarer quests
notes.usage: Investigation quests involve gathering clues and solving mysteries. Easy investigations have few clues and optional combat, medium investigations feature time limits and multiple endings, hard investigations require stealth and may involve betrayals.
notes.clues: Number of clues to discover before quest conclusion
notes.multiple_endings: Quest outcome varies based on player choices and clues found
notes.stealth: Required stealth skill level to avoid detection during investigation
